nodes.asset_description: Flat vector illustration of a terracotta-orange wooden easel (#C85B3E) with two splayed legs and a central support. A pale pink rectangular paper/canvas (#F3B3AD) sits centered on the easel with a matching terracotta top and bottom clamp; the top clamp has a small circular hole detail. All shapes are simple, solid fills without outlines or gradients.

nodes.text:
DO THINGS AT YOUR
OWN PACE. LIFE'S NOT
A RACE.
